pages.text: Rumor has it, large trusty rodents inhabit $(thing)Savanna$() biomes. These are well known for their love of $(item)Apples$(), ability to carry multiple $(item)Chests$() worth of items, and strange obedience towards $(item)Sticks$().$(br2)Having one at your side seems like a great way to help transport large hauls.
Discover and tame a beast of burden of your own.
